 iPad net sales decreased during 2022 compared to 2021 due primarily to lower net sales of iPad Pro.

 Services net sales increased during 2022 compared to 2021 due primarily to higher net sales from advertising, cloud services and the App Store.Discussions of 2020 items and year-to-year comparisons between 2021 and 2020 are not included in this Form 10-K, and can be found in “Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations” in Part II, Item 7 of the Company’s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended September 25, 2021.
 Total net sales increased 8% or $28.
5 billion during 2022 compared to 2021, driven primarily by higher net sales of iPhone, Services and Mac.Similar disruptions could occur in the future.

Relevant documents for AAPL in the year 2021 : Mac net sales increased during 2021 compared to 2020 due primarily to higher net sales of MacBook Air, MacBook Pro and iMac.
 iPad net sales increased during 2021 compared to 2020 due primarily to higher net sales of iPad Air and iPad Pro.
 Wearables, Home and Accessories net sales increased during 2021 compared to 2020 due primarily to higher net sales of accessories and Apple Watch.Mac net sales increased during 2021 compared to 2020 due primarily to higher net sales of MacBook Air, MacBook Pro and iMac.

 Wearables, Home and Accessories net sales include sales of AirPods, Apple TV, Apple Watch, Beats products, HomePod, iPod touch and accessories.Services net sales include sales from the Company’s advertising, AppleCare, cloud, digital content, payment and other services.
 Services net sales also include amortization of the deferred value of services bundled in the sales price of certain products.
 iPhone net sales increased during 2021 compared to 2020 due primarily to higher net sales from the Company’s new iPhone models launched in the first quarter and fourth quarter of 2021 and a favorable mix of iPhone sales.

 



    Answer the list of user questions ['Apple in 2022', 'Apple in 2021'], answer each question separately from the relevant document.


    Don't make up any information, if the relevant information is not in the corresponding relevant documents, then say that you don't have that information.

**assistant**: Question: Apple in 2022
Answer: In 2022, Apple experienced an increase in total net sales of 8% or $28.5 billion compared to 2021. This growth was primarily driven by higher net sales of iPhone, Services, and Mac. Mac net sales increased due to higher sales of laptops, while iPad net sales decreased primarily due to lower sales of iPad Pro. Wearables, Home, and Accessories net sales increased primarily due to higher sales of Apple Watch and AirPods. Services net sales also increased, driven by higher sales from advertising, cloud services, and the App Store. The weakness in foreign currencies relative to the U.S. dollar had an unfavorable impact on all Products and Services net sales during 2022.

Question: Apple in 2021
Answer: In 2021, Apple saw an increase in Mac net sales compared to 2020, primarily driven by higher sales of MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, and iMac. iPad net sales also increased compared to 2020, primarily due to higher sales of iPad Air and iPad Pro. Wearables, Home, and Accessories net sales increased, driven by higher sales of accessories and Apple Watch. Additionally, iPhone net sales increased in 2021 compared to 2020, primarily due to the launch of new iPhone models and a favorable mix of iPhone sales.
